attributes.review: This app need to be taken down, not only did it have glitches and bugs. I had to get my phone wiped completely after using this app. Also I downloaded this app to help me become a trump supporter, that never happen. It’s the worst app anyone could ever download. There’s also a lot of ads for some reason. You think they would take them off of the app because it is our president. I would NOT download this app ever again.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
It hurt me very much to download, most would say “heartbreaking,” but I’ve had my heart broken before and the pain of getting this app compares to nothing. A major problem with this app is that it ask for my phone number! very personal Mr. Trump!!!!! i thought you were about keeping my freedoms and rights, but asking for such a thing is such a violation of the constitution. Who knows what he can do with our information!!! Fake news 😡😡😡😡

Not sorry
attributes.title: just wow

attributes.review: When downloading the app my phone crashed 6 times and ultimately exploded causing shrapnel to enter my eyes and cause permanent blindness. I laid down to morn my ended career as a surgeon when I 2 quick steps and a plop. I tasted a familiar 💩. How could I not know who it was, I’ve been eating it for the last 4 years. I could hear him lumbering out of my room whispering to himself “build a wall” and “cHiNa”. This was a gift from the 🍊 god!!! I cried out and rejoiced, 4 more years!!! 4 more years!!!

I was so excited to get my Oompa Loompa president’s app. First it took a while week to download and it started playing the national anthem.🇺🇸 I was petting my dog 🐶 at the time and when he hear the music 🎶 he was killed. ☠️💀☠️ It also glitched my whole iPad making it hard to type o B a mA. Sometimes it would randomly connect to a blue tooth speaker 🔊 and blast him speaking at his rallies. It took weeks to uninstall and I am still grieving from my dog. 🐕 𝑇𝑟𝑢𝑚𝑝 2020🧚🏽‍♂️❤️💞𝑏𝑢𝑡 𝑚𝑎𝑘𝑒 𝑖𝑡 𝑜𝑛 𝑎 𝑔𝑟𝑎𝑣𝑒 💓🧚🏽‍♂️👁👄👁
attributes.title: Killed my dog

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and was shocked to see a chubby orange Cheese puff, fully nude. It was horrifying. Then, a few days later, I got a knock at the door and wondered who it could be, I saw the orange Cheeto puff man standing outside my house. He then proceeded to scream racist and homophobic things at the top of his lungs and I was scared for my life. He went and trashed my home, but that’s not all. He put my pet goldfish on the stove and started cooking him (rip jerry) and then ate him. I don’t recommend this app at all 😖😢 it was traumatizing 😗
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD, IM TRAMATIZED

attributes.review: i was delighted by this app, it looked sexy, wonderful, juicy the first time i heard about it, BUT WHEN LILDICK BOY CAME ON SCREEN, my phone screen shattered. just how they say "you're so ugly, you'll break a mirror" THAT IS WHAT HAPPENED TO MY PHONE SCREEN 😐😠 NOW I DEMAND ORANGE MAN AND HIS MINIONS to offer me a new screen replacement. thank you very much. and to the poor, pathetic, low life republican who might be reading this, my brain🧠 is poisoned💉 and I’m searching🧐 for the anecdote🤕 but every time⏰ iℹ️find💅🏼 it😌 my✨defenses🥊 scream😱 oh no❌ you don’t😰 woah😳
attributes.title: MANE THIS APP IS A NO GO!!! 🙉

attributes.review: i would give it no star but that isn’t a option. it loaded me in then kicked me out. i think it’s because he knows i’m black and hates black people. anyways once i got on there one of his shirts said “i think to touch little kids , especially my daughter”  i was in shock. well no that shocked because i already knew he did that. overall th e orange cheeto puff that we have as a president apparently can’t make a app or run a country. smh. anyways OBAMAFORVER, BLM, JUSTICE FOR THOSE WHO KILLED INNOCENT BLACK PEOPLE, DEFUND THE POLICE, ACAB.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with my president, Donny. When I first got onto the app, it asked me for my feet pictures. Of course, I said yes because I’d do anything for Donny. But it kept on asking for feet pictures every time I got onto the app. I felt very uncomfortable, especially seeing other people’s hairy, crusty feet. I still love you Donny, but please change this. Despite being your biggest supporter, I feel very very uncomfortable seeing all these feet. LONG LIVE AMERIKKKA ❤️ #MAGA2020 🇱🇷💜

This app is horrible it took forever to download. Then when I tried using the app it kept taking me back to the home screen of my phone, so I had to wait a week until I could use it. When I was finally able to get on the app it kept asking for personal information. I do not recommend this app. It is by far the worse app I have ever seen in my whole entire lifetime,and that’s a long time.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I dowloaded the app the see what all the hype on tiktok was about but when i opened it, it tried to force me to give him my number!! Im not into you please stop asking for my number 😔😔😔 Also, it took 2 months for it download? Like WHAT!? Also, it kept quitting me out for a good 2 years and the 5th time i tried a bunch of bugs (🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗) Came out and tried to attack me?! You need to fix your app 🍊 or else im gonna be really hurt 🥺🥺🥺😔😔😔👽👽🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️✨✨✨
attributes.title: Horrible app 🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟
